item.title: How much do you need to earn to affordthe averagerent?
item.description: Rental growth is slowing and making rents more affordable for tenants, but what hwo much do you need to earn to afford the average UK rent?

item.title: FCA launches scam checker tool after 800,000 suspected to have lost money to fraudsters
item.description: Savers and investors can use the tool to check if a firm is the 'real deal' and is actually authorised to provide the services it is offering

item.title: Top 10 locations for buyers and renters revealed
item.description: London is crowned as the most popular location for renters and buyers, despite rising costs. But where else are house hunters heading to?

item.title: Making financial gifts to loved ones? Write it down or risk giving an IHT bill too
item.description: Giving gifts can be a way to pass on wealth and reduce the inheritance tax bill on your estate but do it wrong and you could leave family and friends ...
